name: A. Difference Operations
statement:
You are given an array a consisting of n positive integers.You are
allowed to perform this operation any number of times (possibly, zero):
choose an index i (2
le i
le n), and change a_i to a_i - a_{i-1}. Is it possible to make a_i=0 for
all 2
le i
le n?
